item.description: Structure Fire; INC#0346; 06:06AM; 745 W El Segundo Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3zDGlNl; Harbor Gateway; FIRE NOW OUT: 30 firefighters extinguished fire in an apartment in 17 minutes. The first arriving fire company reported finding a two story apartment building with heavy smoke showing from one side. An offensive fire attack ensued and crews held the fire to one unit. Smoke infiltrated adjacent units but no fire damage. One occupant of the involved unit was evaluated for possible smoke inhalation and declined hospital transport. There were no other injuries reported. The 9-1-1 call was received at 5:49AM. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 E233 E264 E64 E79 EM13 RA257 RA264 RA79 T33 T64; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0796; 12:51PM; 4037 W Tracy St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3bHJaES; Los Feliz; KNOCKDOWN: 28 firefighters extinguished the fire in 19 minutes. The residence has two floors of residential over the garage. Firefighters contained the fire to the 1st floor (garage) which had no auto but a significant amount of stored belongings. Their actions prevented the fire from extending into the floors above. One patient is being evaluated for smoke inhalation and does not appear to need/want ambulance transport. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 56; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E12 E220 E235 E35 RA35 RA56 RA835 T20 T35; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0796; 12:32PM; 4037 W Tracy St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3bHJaES; Los Feliz; Three story, single family dwelling with a well involved garage fire (1st floor). Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 56; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E12 E220 E235 E35 RA35 RA56 T20 T35; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0411; 08:13AM; 3821 S Hobart Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3P99Goq; Exposition Park; FIRE NOW OUT: 32 firefighters extinguished a well entrenched attic fire in a one story single family dwelling in 18 minutes with no injuries reported. Upon LAFD arrival, firefighters found smoke showing from the attic and entered into an offensive mode. The interior of the home was clear and crews made their way up into the attic to knock down the fire. Cause and $ loss TBD. Original 9-1-1 call received at 7:55AM; FS 34; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC18 E15 E215 E226 E26 E294 E34 RA26 T15 T26 T94; CH7; 14; Margaret Stewart

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0707; 12:01PM; 1766 S Walgrove Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QgimKU; #MarVista; *Corrected Address*. Solo passenger vehicle struck and came to rest well within a 738 square foot two-story home (built 1952), causing structural compromise and erupting in heavy fire prior to LAFD arrival. 59 Firefighters took 65 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish the stubborn flames within the heavily damaged structure, and rescue one female adult found within the vehicle, who has been taken to an area hospital by LAFD Paramedics in critical condition. No other injuries reported. LAFD PIO Captain Erik Scott is en route. Media Inquiries: LAFD PIO and LAPD West Traffic Division (Incident #1736); FS 63; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC1 BC18 BC9 CM40 CM42 EA1 E19 E263 E269 E27 E295 E43 E5 E62 E63 E94 EM9 HR3 LF5 PI1 RA62 RA63 T63 T69 T95 UR5 UR88; CH7; 14; Brian Humphrey

Traffic Collision with Fire; INC#0707; 10:56AM; 1802 S Walgrove Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3BL0yTZ; #MarVista; PRELIM: Solo vehicle struck and came to rest within a two-story home with fire.; FS 63; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC18 E269 E43 E62 E63 EM9 HR3 RA62 RA63 T69 UR88; CH7; 14; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Traffic Collision with Entrapment 08/04/2022 INC#1804

item.description: Update Traffic Collision with Entrapment; INC#1804; 11:42PM; 17730 W Vanowen St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3SnTse9; #LakeBalboa; The one person trapped in an overturned vehicle has been freed, and is being transported to a regional trauma center by LAFD Paramedics in critical condition. *Three* other patients have declined care. LADWP is on scene to assist with securing (unidentified) source) of water flow. Media Inquiries: LAPD Valley Traffic Division (Incident #5035); FS 100; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E100 E273 E293 E93 EM15 HR3 RA100 RA73 RA889 T73 T93 UR88; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Traffic Collision with Entrapment; INC#1804; 11:08PM; 17730 W Vanowen St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3SnTse9; #LakeBalboa; PRELIM: 4 vehicle collision over a large area, including one vehicle that struck and toppled a utility pole, dropping wires before overturning and striking a commercial building, coming to rest with one person trapped and water flowing from a business. Thus far, two other patients (from other vehicles?) are currently declining care. Media Inquiries: LAPD Valley Traffic Division (Incident #5035); FS 100; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E100 E273 E293 E93 EM15 HR3 RA100 RA73 RA889 T73 T93 UR88; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

CONTAINED - Brush Fire; INC#1408; 07:19PM; 12000 W Osborne St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3zXUtj6; #HansenDam; LAFD ground and air responders assisted by Los Angeles County and Angeles National Forest Firefighters have fully contained the fire to one-half (0.50) acre of medium-to-heavy brush within a remote section of the Hansen Dam Recreation Area. No injury. No structures damaged. No evacuation. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC10 BC15 CM42 E239 E274 E287 E290 E298 E39 E77 E90 E91 EM15 H1 H4 H5 HA1 HA4 HA5 RA77 RA81 T39 T74 T87 T90 T98 WT77 + LACoFD + ANF; CH5; 18; Brian Humphrey

Brush Fire; INC#1408; 06:22PM; 12000 W Osborne St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3zXUtj6; #HansenDam; PRELIM: LAFD ground and air response with the Los Angeles County and Angeles National Forest Firefighters to one-half (0.50) acre medium-to-heavy brush burning in the Hansen Dam Recreation Area. No structure threat. No evacuation. ; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC10 BC15 E239 E274 E287 E290 E298 E39 E77 E90 E91 EM15 H1 H4 H5 HA1 HA4 HA5 RA77 RA81 T39 T74 T87 T90 T98 WT77 + LACoFD + ANF; CH5; 18; Brian Humphrey
